nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,19 @@
+CLASS net/minecraft/class_5540 net/minecraft/block/AbstractCandleBlock
+	FIELD field_27083 LIT Lnet/minecraft/class_2746;
+	METHOD method_31610 spawnCandleParticles (Lnet/minecraft/class_1937;Lnet/minecraft/class_243;Ljava/util/Random;)V
+		ARG 0 world
+		ARG 1 vec3d

nodes.bodyText: That is the actual position of the particle, and is calculated by offset.add(pos.getX(), pos.getY(), pos.getZ()), where offset is an offset Vec3d provided by getParticleOffsets /method_31613 and pos is the position of a candle's display tick.
